Game.Name: One Piece - Dragon Dream (Japan)
Game.plot: One Piece: Dragon Dream! is a Role-Playing game, developed by M2 and published by Bandai,which was released in Japan in 2005.Cheat: Play as HatchanSuccessfully complete the game, then press L, R, L, R, A, B, Start during the credits. A sound will confirm correct code entry. Start a new game, then hold R + L to exchange Luffy with Hatchan.Cheat: UnlockablesPerform the operation in order to unlock the thing on the right.
